logging.help:
logging
-------
Controls logging information

Check:
logging.level
logging.saveSubprocessOutErr

cosimHome.help:
cosimHome
---------
Directory where TDcoSim can be found

openDSSConfig.help:
openDSSConfig
-------------
Controls OpenDSS setup

Check:
openDSSConfig.DEROdeSolver
openDSSConfig.manualFeederConfig
openDSSConfig.defaultFeederConfig

psseConfig.help:
psseConfig
----------
Controls PSSE setup

Check:
psseConfig.installLocation
psseConfig.dyrFilePath
psseConfig.rawFilePath

monitor.help: Additional machine/model data to be monitored

simulationConfig.help:
simulationConfig
----------------
Controls simulation setup

Check:
simulationConfig.defaultLoadType
simulationConfig.simType
simulationConfig.dynamicConfig
simulationConfig.staticConfig

outputConfig.help:
outputConfig
------------
Output/results setup

Check:
outputConfig.simID
outputConfig.type
outputConfig.outputDir
outputConfig.outputfilename
outputConfig.scenarioID

simID.help:
outputConfig.simID
------------------

Simulation ID. This ID will be used to create a folder of the same name placed under outputDir.

type.help:
outputConfig.type
-----------------

Type of output. Default is dataframe.

outputDir.help:
outputConfig.outputDir
----------------------

path to directory that stores the simualtion output.

scenarioID.help:
outputConfig.outputDir
-----------------------

scenario ID to use in dataframe. Can be any string that helps describe the scenario.
